adjective.description: Of, belonging to, or relating to a group of broad-tailed parrots typified by the genus Platycercus (now the subfamily Platycercinae), which includes the rosellas.

noun.description: A parrot of the subfamily Platycercinae; a broad-tailed parrot.

origin: Late 19th century; earliest use found in The Century Dictionary. From scientific Latin Platycercus, genus name + -ine.
